column1: El Zarqa (Arabic: الزرقا‎) is a city in Damietta Governorate
column3: 741. The city president is Mamdouh Mohammed Hagrus.In antiquity
column4: El Zarqa was known as Maximianon (Μαξιμιανόν) in Greek and Maximianum in Latin. It had a Roman fort guarding the road from Koptos to Myos Hormos.
